text: Ben's Kid is a 1909 American silen comedy movie directed by Francis BoggsBen’s KidBen’s Kid and stars Tom Santschi, Harry Todd, and Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle. ==Actors== * Tom Santschi as Thomas Santschi * Harry Todd * Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle as Roscoe Arbuckle ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1909 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies
title: Ben's Kid
